Semi-Historical Gunner's Auxiliary Sight (GAS) for M1 Abrams

The gunner's auxiliary sight (GAS) is the gunner's secondary means to engage targets when the GPS is disabled or when the fire control system has a fault.

Usable with the sight distance control axis.

Contains folder and file (heat and apfsds) for:
M1, IPM1, M1A1, M1A2
